text: @rahulkanwal @PMOIndia @realDonaldTrump Requesting @PMOIndia Modi Ji to also aware public in remote rural areas through gram pradhan and panchayat @MoRD_GOI many people can't understand the COVId19 & 21days locked-down  motive, people are still roaming around villages, in some cases also going to Temple
